name: Instant Summer
description:
Instant Summer

Game description

  • You are a powerful magician who can control weather using his magic deck of cards.Pick the weather for each event, balance the elements and avoid the apocalypse.
  • Randomly generated events and unique choices for each event.
  • Multiple playthroughs to try all possible scenarios.
  • If you ever play with weather, please be careful!!!
